SELECT MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ID, MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.SCHEDULE_KIND_ID, MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_NAME, MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.COLOR_R, MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.COLOR_G, MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.COLOR_B,
MS_SCHEDULE_KIND.SCHEDULE_KIND_NAME, MS_SCHEDULE_KIND.SCHEDULE_CATEGORY_ID,
MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.DELETE_FLAG, MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.CREATE_DATE, MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.UPDATE_DATE, MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.CREATE_MS_USER_ID, MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
FROM MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL
INNER JOIN MS_SCHEDULE_KIND ON MS_SCHEDULE_KIND.SCHEDULE_KIND_ID = MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.SCHEDULE_KIND_ID
WHERE MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.DELETE_FLAG = False

INSERT INTO MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL( SCHEDULE_KIND_ID , SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_NAME , COLOR_R, COLOR_G, COLOR_B, DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , CREATE_MS_USER_ID ) VALUES( :SCHEDULE_KIND_ID , :SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_NAME , :COLOR_R, :COLOR_G, :COLOR_B, :DELETE_FLAG , :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , :CREATE_MS_USER_ID )

UPDATE MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL SET SCHEDULE_KIND_ID = :SCHEDULE_KIND_ID , SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_NAME = :SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_NAME , COLOR_R = :COLOR_R, COLOR_G = :COLOR_G, COLOR_B = :COLOR_B, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID = :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
WHERE SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ID = :SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ID
